attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: To be honest I got the app as a joke and had low expectations, but not this low. This app is awful just like the president, it is a piece of garbage. So let’s get this app removed and dump trump like trash.

attributes.title: I’m sad 😔
attributes.review:
I got this app to support my lovely president.🥰🥰
But I don’t know why, I have problem with this app😔😔.
I expected a lot more for someone who is president 😢. Hope y’all have a great day 🙏.

attributes.title: This app is bad Tekiyah
attributes.review: This app is very bad because it shows young kids about the 45 president and how he is doing in the world I just don’t like the app horrible thank you.

attributes.title: Terrible 😖
attributes.review: Please do not download this app!! They stole my social security information and I went bankrupt! I couldn’t afford my mortgage so I lost my house and Karen took the kids 😿

attributes.title: The worst thing in the world since the last elections
attributes.review: This app is the worst!!!! Highly do not recommend for anyone with any sort of brain cells left.

attributes.title: scam 😔
attributes.review: ew!!! i downloaded this app with a PROMISE that big time rush would serenade me at 9:20am every day by singing their theme song while feeding me grapes and nothing happened 😔 this app is a scam and i’m over it- where is btr?????

attributes.title: The wall was blocking my view
attributes.review: I opened up the app and the great big wall was blocking my view of the app! I couldn’t see anything! Fix your wall trump #savetiktok

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I heard a rumor that if you did Taylor Swift would give me a ride to New York but that didn’t happen so all I got was an app that forced me to look at a clothed Cheeto puff

attributes.title: Don’t get this app!
attributes.review: The app took 38 weeks to download and when I finally got on it and put in my info, I started being sent death threats!

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: It keeps crashing my phone so I have to restart my phone over and over delete the app
